entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
